channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How To Thoroughly Monitor And Protect Software Supply Chains
item.description: While it’s easy enough to inspect a physical chain for weaknesses, gaining visibility into the full length of a software supply chain is more complica...

item.title: A possible AI future
item.description: Persistent, connected and kind. Most visions of the internet in 1995 were about individuals interacting with content online. It turns out that the int...

item.title: ‘Potentially Hazardous’ Asteroid Will Zoom By Earth Tonight—But NASA Says It’s Safe: What To Know
item.description: The asteroid is around 500 feet and will come within 2 million miles of Earth, which is about eight times further than the moon.

item.title: Vocal fatigue

item.title: Sean O’Malley Gives Surprising Timetable For His Return
item.description: Don’t expect to see Sean O’Malley back in the Octagon for a while. On a recent episode of his podcast, O'Malley gave a surprising timetable for his re...

item.title: Bye now
item.description: The difference between ‘buy now’ and ‘bye now’ is very thin. Sometimes, when we push very hard for a commitment, we break the trust we’ve earned. For ...

item.title: Modern apologies
item.description: The AI driven voice mail system said, “I’m sorry, I didn’t understand you.” Of course, there is no “I” and by most definitions of sorry, it’s not. But...

item.title: Meet America’s Best Employers For Tech Workers 2024

item.title: The hierarchy of insight
item.description: It looks like this: Which do we measure the most, spend the most obtaining and argue about most often? We might have it backwards. HT Russ Ackoff.
